p: The calculations carried out with all-electron linear combination of atomic orbitals (AE–LCAO) have been performed using the CRYSTAL software (Dovesi et al., 2014). In the AE–LCAO formalism implemented in CRYSTAL (Dovesi et al., 2014), the crystalline orbitals are expanded as a linear combination of atom centered Gaussian orbitals with s, p, or d symmetry (the basis set). AE calculations were performed in which there is no shape approximation to the potential or density.
